reviews.review_msg: Niall holds his head higher than everyone and feeds off of the student-professor power difference. I would go to his office hours weekly and still found myself unable to improve even after using his criticism. He makes an intro to writing class harder than it needs to be, especially considering he is only a sessional instructor in humanities.
Make sure you go to his office hour to discuss your papers before you hang them in. You will learn a lots!

Niall Mackenzie is the definition of boring incredibly boring. He is the pickiest marker and will penalize you for really small things and he assigns way to many papers. He makes you read allowed in class and he favourites students. Take this course is 1 . You want to bring your GPA down 2. If you like arrogant, stuck up profs.

Niall is very sarcastic and funny. He is VERY picky, but cares about how you do and tries to really help you out (so much feedback on papers!). He is super accessible via email and really nice during office hours. Hard to get an A, but if you work really hard, it's possible.

He is a extremely strict marker but if you are a generally smart person you can do fair in his class.  It is really hard to get an A in this class because he checks every little detail, and will penalize you on it.  Boring class overall and he is quite a formal guy in appearance and communication.

Prof Turner is very helpful, approachable and kind. Her classes get some getting used to but tie in the concepts learned very well. Assignments and final were very fair. Use all her edits on your papers and put in the effort to ask for help because she genuinely wants you to do well. She helped me get an A in a class I dreaded at the start of sem!

Prof Turner is amazingly helpful, approachable and kind. As long as you put in the effort to ask for help she's more than willing to give you it. Her teaching gets some getting used to, but ties everything from the textbook to her lectures well. Her assignments and final were very fair. Follow any and all advice she gives, definite grade booster.
